news.title: Rush to clamp down on firms attempting to undermine My Future Fund auto-enrolment pension
news.summary: The Government is being forced to bring in emergency regulations to stop companies attempting to subvert the new auto-enrolment pension.

news.title: Enoch Burke’s refusal to answer judge leaves questions about sources of income hanging in the air
news.summary: A third of the way through his blistering judgment ordering the immediate imprisonment of Enoch Burke, Mr Justice Brian Cregan raised an issue that has occupied the minds of judges but has received little attention thus far in the Wilson’s Hospital School saga.

news.title: Ivan Yates has ‘some regrets’ over smear remark – but tells TDs Catherine Connolly campaign ‘weaponised’ comments
news.summary: Broadcaster and media coach Ivan Yates has said he has “some regrets” about his comments that Fine Gael should “smear the bejaysus” out of Catherine Connolly during the presidential campaign.

news.title: ‘Absolute disgrace’ – judge condemns farmer who abused three granddaughters and transferred land to avoid compensation
news.summary: An elderly farmer who sexually abused his three granddaughters has been condemned along with his son and heir as “an absolute disgrace” and devoid of decency by a judge during civil proceedings taken by one of the victims.

news.title: What I spend on Christmas: ‘We have 21 gifts to buy… I estimate we’ll spend around €3,000 on overall shopping’
news.summary: It’s that time of year again when purse strings will be loosened and budgets will be stretched as households up and down the country splash out on gifts for loved ones as well as treats for themselves.

news.title: Just Between Us: From ghosting to ‘Are We Dating The Same Guy?’- Modern love in Ireland
news.summary: This week on Just Between Us, Jennifer Zamparelli brings together three single guests in their 20s, 30s and 40s to explore the realities of modern dating. Is modern dating really as chaotic as it seems?

news.title: Miguel Delaney: How the best week of the football year surpassed all expectations
news.summary: As Steve Clarke finally settled and tried to make sense of what had just happened in Hampden Park, he seized the moment in his own way.

news.title: ‘My child suffered a neonatal brain injury, I am not just a minister but a parent’ – Jennifer Carroll MacNeill on family experience
news.summary: Health Minister Jennifer Carroll MacNeill has spoken of how her child suffered a neonatal brain injury and the emotional toll it takes on parents who must go to court.

news.title: Eight Christmas dinner options without the turkey: ‘It’s a simple choice, but one that makes the day infinitely more enjoyable’
news.summary: Christmas is coming but this year it doesn’t look like the goose, or the turkey, is getting fat as an outbreak of bird flu has led to the culling of thousands of birds in farms across the country, many of which were destined for the Christmas market.

news.title: Why stablecoins will be bigger than crypto, with Ireland as a prime experiment
news.summary: According to the European Central Bank, so-called ‘stablecoins’ will grow in value from €200bn in 2025 to almost €2tn by the end of 2028.
